[BACK](https://www.westhillsvineyards.com/join)
###### From our  
family to yours. As long-time locals, when the opportunity to acquire a piece of Polk County history presented itself we couldn't pass it by. As we embark on this historic landscape's next chapter, our mission is to grow grapes with regenerative practices that restore and breathe new life into fields that were once over-farmed and left neglected for many years.
